name: Inductive Automation
tag_list: scada-software, mes-software, hmi-software, manufacturing-software, mobile-scada, mobile-hmi, mobile-mes, control-system-software, web-based-scada, web-based-hmi, web-based-mes, cross-platform-scada, cross-platform-hmi, cross-platform-mes
overview:
Develops HMI, SCADA & MES software for industrial automation manufacturing systems and process control systems. The web-based, cross-platform software provides real-time data acquisition, data visualization, and supervisory control.

Users can create any size system for one price: every server license includes unlimited tags and clients, allowing companies to add users or process more data without paying anything extra.

A fully functional software demo download is available and can be used to test a full implementation before purchase.
